name: NATIONAL LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS MEMORIAL FUND
sampleDescriptions: Outreach to House and Senate offices in support of legislation to have the U.S. Treasury mint a coin in commemoration of the National Law Enforcement Museum.
Outreach to House and Senate offices  to provide information on the progress of the National Law Enforcement Museum project and NLEOMF's outreach and education programs related to law enforcement and
Outreach to House and Senate offices in support of legislation, H.R. 4732 and S. 2863, to have the U.S. Treasury mint a coin in commemoration of the National Law Enforcement Museum.
Outreach to House and Senate offices in support of  H.R. 1417 the National Law Enforcement Museum Exhibits Act.
Outreach to House and Senate offices in support of legislation, H.R. 4732 and S. 2863, to have the U.S. Treasury mint a coin in commemoration of the National Law Enforcement Museum.
